name: croaked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
croak
croak verb
(MAKE SOUND)
[ I or T ] When animals such as frogs and crows croak, they make deep rough sounds.
If you croak, you speak with a rough voice because you have a sore or dry throat.
